title: Market value of honey in China based on sale price 2008 to 2015
yAxis: Market value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This statistic displays the Market of value China ( UK ) honey China from 2008 to 2015 .
328.7 value were recorded in 2008 , with numbers increasing during the following years .
Though by 2015 numbers had dropped to 328.7 value .
